name: Super Surfers Pets: Run game
description:
Super Surfers Pets is one of the most exciting run games in 2018.

This endless run game has an amazing and easy gameplay :
- Swipe left to slide to the left
- Swipe right to slide to the right
- Swipe forward to jump
- Swipe backward to scroll

You can collect power ups to help you during the run and unlock more items, characters and themes in the store.
